abstract.p: Correction of May 21 New York Stock Exchange tables, which reflected erroneous trading period; they showed activity for Friday, May 19, rather than for entire week (S)

block.p: The New York Stock Exchange tables last Sunday reflected an erroneous trading period. They showed activity for Friday, May 19, rather than the week's. Readers wishing the correct version may write to Money & Business Tables, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036-3959, or telephone (212) 556-4128. E-mail: sunfin@nytimes.com. (Include a postal address.)
